sentence.Network_en: You can't dogmatize about people's needs.
sentence.Network_cn: 对人民之所需不能武断.

sentence.Network_en: But to absolutize and dogmatize the reasonable factors will deprive them of their rationality.
sentence.Network_cn: 但把合理因素绝对化、教条化就丧失其价值合理性.

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 17th cent.: via French and late Latin from Greek dogmatizein 'lay down one's opinion', from dogma (see dogma)
